subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Spooner and Patrice Bergeron scored, Tuukka Rask made 36 saves, and the visiting Boston Bruins beat the Islanders, 2-1, on Sunday night to end a three-game losing streak.
snippet: Ryan Spooner and Patrice Bergeron scored, Tuukka Rask made 36 saves, and the visiting Boston Bruins beat the Islanders, 2-1, on Sunday night to end a three-game losing streak.
